M10Robot:Eye.NAME: Third Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b

M10Robot:DualCore.NAME: Dual Core
DESCRIPTIONS: #ym10robot:Overclock the first card you play each combat #b

M10Robot:AwakenedCore.NAME: Awakened Core
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#b9c5b4]Dual [#b9c5b4]Core. #ym10robot:Overclock the first card you play each turn #b

M10Robot:Froggy.NAME: Froggy
M10Robot:Froggy.FLAVOR: It has a very sticky tongue.

M10Robot:RoboBall.NAME: Robo Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you are attacked each combat, take no damage. The attacker takes the full damage instead.

M10Robot:Ufo.NAME: UFO
M10Robot:Ufo.FLAVOR: It got lost on it's way to the jungle dance party.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower card, ALL enemies lose #b
